title: My champion store is really bright now
body:
http://prntscr.com/c5pdgb

I don't know what I did but now the background/front is really bright and no matter what it stays that way.

replies.body:
It's possible that you may have accidentally tried selecting multiple items with a left click and drag or a CTRL + A. Try restarting your client entirely to see if it persists. If it does, I recommend working through these steps in our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), since the store is technically a frame running with internet explorer settings.

Let me know if this helped.
Thanks, it worked . I restarted the client and it was gone. I think I did select multiple items.
